title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a refundable credit for increasing employment.
content: Tax Credits for Jobs Now Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a refundable tax credit for: (1) 60 of the excess of the aggregate wages paid to employees during 2012 over the aggregate wages paid during 2011, and (2) 40 of the excess of such wages paid during 2013 over the aggregate inflation-adjusted wages paid during 2012. Limits the maximum amount of such credit to $500,000 in any calendar year.
